data.text: @wickym Thanks! I knew about the restrooms. Will see if my building is using better filters. As for the windows, those will not open 🤷🏽

@Peralt04987342 This is a good place to start. Don’t hang out in the restrooms. 

https://t.co/WlZrl2irfC
@wickym Of course. It’s a very smart virus.

@wickym I do work in an office building, albeit not as tall as yours. I am interested in learning as it may be something I could apply or prepare for. Would you mind sharing other risks that you have identified?

@Peralt04987342 Not really. There’s are multiple dangers in the office tower that I cannot control. I’ve been studying covid and its airborne spread like it’s my second job for two years. It’s not pretty.
@GlitteryFab Yes. Not that I will attend large indoor gatherings, but it is 100% anti-science.

@wickym No need to be scared. Do your best to manage risk. You are already vaccinated, are responsible with distancing and wear a mask that is adequate for the environment you will work in. You got this! 😎
